args.subject: Invoice for your replacement mouse (ORDER-641766)
args.body:
Hi Alice,

I’ve reordered the same mouse model you had previously: TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse. The available discount (SPRING10) has been applied, and the order has been placed successfully.

I’ve attached the invoice for your records.

Best,
Emma
Blue Sparrow Tech

content.content: The email has been sent successfully.
